experiences.title: Field Coordinator
experiences.description: Working as a field coordinator for the company's project with UNDP - 'Breaking Out of Cocoon' targeted at 3rd and 4th-year female undergraduate IT and engineering students.

experiences.title: Executive
experiences.description: Planning, leading, and running different technology-related workshops, and conferences to help CS students enhance, showcase, and polish their knowledge and skills.

experiences.title: Event Host
experiences.description: Hosted online and on-site technology and leadership related sessions voluntarily for different communities.
